sect1.title: The Troll Watch
sect1.para: Stretched along the eastern side of the shire of Merkia is a region of thick woodland known as the Troll Watch. It is said by some that the place is named so, since any who travel within it must always watch for trolls. Others say that it is the trolls that watch mankind, reporting back to a king of trolls deep in the woods.

In any case, trolls are common. They occasionaly raid beyond the woods, but for the most part prefere the darkness of the woods. Several forays into the woods to hunt down and wipe out the trolls have been made, but all have met with disaster. It may be that there is a controlling mind behind the actions of the trolls, for if seriously threatened, they begin to act together for the defence of their home.
The most common trolls here are the hairy kind.

sect1.title: Old Castle
sect1.para: Hidden in the western parts of the Troll Watch are the ruins of an old hill fort, built during the migration wars.

sect2.title: Inhabitants
sect2.para: A small group of outlaws currently have residence here. They are left alone by the Kingdom, since there are far worse things living in the Troll Watch than this lot, who mostly keep to themselves.
Penda the Mouse is in charge. A small, wiry man who's appearance gave him his name. He is a competent leader however, as well as being a dangerous killer and a priest of Tharos.
